data.question: Who are the authors of the study on Tetraazacoronenes and their oligomers?
data.answer: Robert Eichelmann, Joachim Ballmann, and Lutz H. Gade

data.question: What method was used to synthesize Tetraazacoronenes from bay-functionalized tetraazaperylenes?
data.answer: Zr-mediated cyclization and four-fold Suzuki–Miyaura cross coupling

data.question: What was the fluorescence quantum yield of the synthesized materials at 659 nm?
Is the synthesis of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) a focus of extensive research due to their applications in organic electronics?
Did the study report the synthesis of a single fully characterized tetraazacoronene prior to their work?
What was the starting compound for the tetraazacoronene synthesis?
What was the main reaction product when compound 2 was subjected to a zirconium mediated cyclization?
data.answer: The trimethylsilyl (TMS) substituted doubly cyclobutene-annulated azacoronene 4

data.question: Can the TMS groups of compound 4 be removed to form the cyclobutene-annulated azacoronene 5?
What was the purpose of using (E)-(1,2-bis(pinacolatoboryl)vinyl)trimethylsilane in the synthesis?
data.answer: As a vinylene building block for the bay-area of 1 and subsequent desilylation

data.question: Were higher oligomers of azacoronene formed during the reaction?
What was the effect of π-extension on the bathochromic shift of the absorption maxima?
data.answer: Most pronounced upon going from 6 to 7 (103 nm) and decays towards the higher oligomers

data.question: Are all compounds highly fluorescent with the emission band being Stokes shifted?
What was the fluorescence quantum yield of the parent compound 6?
Did the study provide a new synthetic approach to azacoronene dyes?
What was the main reason for the diastereoselective formation of compound 4?
data.answer: The relative orientation of the Zr-centers on both sides in the cyclization process

data.question: What was the bond length of the connecting carbon atoms in the aromatic cores of 7 and 8 compared to doubly cyclobutene-annulated azacoronene 4?
Did the study acknowledge support by the state of Baden-Württemberg through bwHPC?
What was the main goal of the study?
data.answer: To provide a synthetic approach to a new class of azacoronene dyes and extended nanoscale azaaromatic systems with high fluorescence properties

data.question: Was the study dedicated to Professor Andreas Grohmann on the occasion of his 60th birthday?
What was the main challenge in the development of coronene dyes according to the study?
data.answer: Limited synthetic accessibility for a long time
